lyrics:
16 contributorstranslationsespañol​don’t tell my mom lyricsintro
daddy just cut your hair today didnt he
yeah
do you like it
no i cried
you did cry
i cried

verse 1
sweetie will you come home
were tracking your car
who are you with what are you on
pick up the phone
when i was young
my problems were her problems
now i dont wanna cause trouble at all
i dont want the call

prechorus
sayin were worried about you were worried about you
dont worry about me just worry about you

chorus
so dont tell my mom im fallin apart
she hurts when i hurt my scars are her scars
shell talk to her friends impress all of them
at least in her mind hеr daughter is fine
oh pleasе please dont dont let let her hear
im dyin inside
cause shes dealt dealt with with this this for years
i got it this time
see reneé rapp liveget tickets as low as 119you might also likeverse 2
i wait til im home
cry in the shower for two to three hours
til the tears are gone
then pick up the phone
now when we speak
i lie and say i slept for eight hours
all seven nights of the week
shell get to sleep

prechorus
cause i worry about you i worry about you
dont worry about me just worry about you

chorus
so dont tell my mom im fallin apart
she hurts when i hurt my scars are her scars
shell talk to her friends impress all of them
at least in her mind her daughter is fine
oh please please dont dont let let her hear
im dyin inside
cause shes dealt dealt with with this this for years
i got it this time

bridge
what you dont know wont hurt you oohoohooh
mama ill lie just for you no
what you dont know wont hurt you oh oohoohooh
mama ill lie just for you
outro
so dont tell my mom shes wearin my heart
her daughter might cry but shell be alright7embed
